item.title: Baby John Box Office Day 2 (Early Trends): Suffers Over 55% Drop Post Christmas, Varun Dhawan’s Film Is In Alarming Situation! - Koimoi
item.description:
Baby John Box Office Day 2 (Early Trends): Suffers Over 55% Drop Post Christmas, Varun Dhawan’s Film Is

Publication Date: December 26, 2024

Source: Koimoi

The action thriller Baby John, led by Varun Dhawan, faced a disappointing downturn in box office collections after a promising opening. Despite expectations, the film struggled against competition and mixed reviews.

Key Points:

  • Day 1 box office: 11.25 crores
  • Day 2 early estimates: 4-5 crores
  • Overall collection for two days: 15.25-16.25 crores
  • Film’s release coincided with the successful Pushpa 2
  • Daily drop in revenue between 55-64% indicating poor audience reception
"The mixed word-of-mouth is visibly impacting the footfall, and the film will soon crash if it does not maintain its hold tomorrow."

Overall, Baby John has not met the expected box office performance, raising concerns for its future runs amidst stiff competition.

item.title: Lakshya and Pashmina Roshan to Laapataa Ladies Pratibha Ranta-Nitanshi Goel: 7 Bollywood debuts we witnessed in 2024 - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Bollywood Introduces New Talent: 2024 Debuts

Date: Dec 26, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

As 2024 comes to an end, Bollywood has welcomed several new talents who made their debut this year, bringing fresh energy and excitement to the industry.

  • Lakshya: Debuted with a blockbuster hit, Kill, showcasing an impactful performance.
  • Junaid Khan: Son of Aamir Khan, impressed with his work in Maharaj, exceeding high expectations.
  • Pashmina Roshan: Made her debut in Ishq Vishk Rebound, leaving audiences intrigued with her promise.
  • Jibraan Khan: Returned to lead role in Ishq Vishk Rebound, winning hearts with charismatic performances.
  • Abhay Verma: Stole the show in Munjya, receiving praise for his performance and chemistry with co-star.
  • Pratibha Ranta: Starred in Laapataa Ladies, portraying a character that inspires audiences to find themselves.
  • Nitanshi Goel: Also in Laapataa Ladies, her performance resonated deeply with viewers.

These new actors have shown great potential, making fans excited about their future endeavors.

item.title: Kate Winslet finds a bride for Leonardo DiCaprio, asks 50-year-old actor to settle down | Today News - Mint
item.description:
Kate Winslet finds a bride for Leonardo DiCaprio, asks 50-year-old actor to settle down

Publication Date: Not specified   Source: Radar Online

In a recent report by Radar Online, Kate Winslet expresses her concern for her longtime friend Leonardo DiCaprio, urging him to settle down at 50, despite his ongoing bachelor lifestyle.

  • Kate Winslet continues to maintain a close friendship with DiCaprio, dating back to their roles in Titanic.
  • DiCaprio is currently in a relationship with 26-year-old model Vittoria.
  • An insider revealed that Winslet believes DiCaprio would make a great husband and father.
  • Kate is worried that DiCaprio may miss out on a significant relationship opportunity with Vittoria due to his apprehensions.
  • Winslet has been married to her third husband, Edward Abel Smith, since 2012.
  • The report suggests that DiCaprio has improved his health with Vittoria's influence.
“Kate adores Leo and thinks he'd make a great husband and father...” - Insider Source

In conclusion, Winslet's encouragement reflects her belief in DiCaprio’s potential for a fulfilling family life, urging him to consider commitment more seriously.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Box Office collection Day 22: Allu Arjun blockbuster unstoppable, bags over ₹9 crore | Today News - Mint
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection Day 22

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Not specified

The movie 'Pushpa 2: The Rule,' which premiered on December 5, continues its box office success. On Day 22, it earned ₹7 crore, bringing the total collection to ₹1119.2 crore.

Key Points

  • The film is inching closer to the ₹1500 crore mark.
  • Telugu version collected ₹22.72 crore net, while the Hindi version earned ₹102.3 crores.
  • Notably, the film earned nearly ₹20 crore net on Christmas.
  • An AI-generated video featuring Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna has gone viral.
The unexpected scene in the AI video has gained significant attention online.

In conclusion, 'Pushpa 2' remains a dominant force in theaters, evidencing the star power of Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna.

item.title: Baby John box office collection day 2: Varun Dhawan film sees sharp decline; makes around ₹3.9 crore - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Baby John box office collection day 2: The film narrates the gripping story of a cop who assumes a new identity to provide a safe haven for his daughter.

Date: Dec 26, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

The Varun Dhawan-starrer had a promising start, registering double-digit opening day numbers. However, the film's momentum was short-lived, as it experienced a significant dip at the box office on its second day.

Key Points:

  • The film registered a business of around ₹3.9 crore (nett) in India on day 2.
  • It had an opening day collection of ₹11.25 crore.
  • Total collection in India stands at ₹15.17 crore (nett) after two days.
  • The film had an overall 9.39 percent occupancy on its second day.
  • Footfall varied significantly throughout the day with morning shows at 5.85 percent and evening shows at 11.09 percent.

Notable Quotes:

“There’s no sense of direction, and the cute girl bossing around her dad has no effect.” - Hindustan Times Review

Conclusion:

Despite a strong start, Baby John faces challenges as it enters a critical phase in its box office journey, reflecting the fluctuating dynamics of audience reception in Bollywood.

item.title: Hwang Dong-hyuk on killing off his Squid Game characters: ‘I was always smiling inside’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Hwang Dong-hyuk on killing off his Squid Game characters: ‘I was always smiling inside’

Date: October 2023 | Source: Indian Express

Hwang Dong-hyuk, the creator of Netflix's Squid Game, shares his unique perspective on the deaths of characters in the series, stating that he feels happiness rather than sadness during these moments. With the premiere of season two, he reflects on the evolution of the show and his journey as a creator.

  • Season two of Squid Game has premiered with returning cast member Lee Jung-jae.
  • Hwang originally pitched Squid Game 15 years ago but struggled to find interest until Netflix picked it up as a series.
  • Hwang emphasizes the importance of perseverance and adapting creative ideas over time.
  • The upcoming season features a larger cast, including younger characters reflecting current societal issues.
  • Hwang has stated that season three of Squid Game has already been filmed and is an improvement over season two.
“I never in my wildest dream thought it was going to be this huge.” - Hwang Dong-hyuk

Hwang's insights reveal his thoughtful approach to storytelling and character development, ensuring the show's relevance in today's society.

item.title: Mufasa: The Lion King Week One India Box Office: SRK and Mahesh Babu voiced film emerges a hit with Rs 63.25 crore in 7 days - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Mufasa: The Lion King Week One India Box Office

Published on: Dec 26, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

The Disney live action entertainer, Mufasa: The Lion King, has performed well in its first week, aiming for the Rs 100 crore club by the end of its run.

  • The film has earned Rs 63.25 crore in its first week.
  • Key contributors to its success include voiceovers by Shah Rukh Khan and Mahesh Babu.
  • Daily box office collection showed a positive trend throughout the week.
  • It faced competition from other films but maintained strong interest from families and children.
“Mufasa: The Lion King should be looking to enter the Rs 100 crore club by January 1, and then settle at a lifetime collection around the Rs 125 crore mark in India.”

This initial success sets a positive tone for the film's future earnings in the Indian market.

item.description:
Salman Khan Takes on a Deadly Avatar in Upcoming Film Sikandar

Date: Dec 26, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

Salman Khan is set to unveil the teaser for his much-anticipated film Sikandar on his birthday, much to the excitement of his fans. The film, which also stars Kajal Aggarwal and Rashmika Mandanna, is directed by A R Murugadoss.

  • The teaser for Sikandar will be released tomorrow.
  • Salman's poster reveals an enigmatic look, featuring him in a sleek black suit.
  • The film is scheduled for release on Eid 2025.
  • Fans are eagerly reacting to the first look shared by Salman on social media.
  • Sikandar is produced by Sajid Nadiadwala’s Nadiadwala Grandson Entertainment.
“The biggest comeback of Indian cinema #SalmanKhan.”

This release promises to be a significant moment in Bollywood as Salman Khan is known for his powerful performances and fans are excited for his return to the big screen.

item.title: Boney Kapoor confesses attraction to other women while cherishing late wife Sridevi; ‘I may get attracted to females’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Boney Kapoor Opens Up About His Love for Late Wife Sridevi and Attraction to Other Women

Date: Dec 26, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Boney Kapoor reflects on his deep love for the late Sridevi while acknowledging his potential attraction to other women, emphasizing that his passion for her remains unchanged.

  • Boney Kapoor revealed intimate details about his relationship with late wife Sridevi in a recent interview.
  • He confessed his unconventional proposal in 1996 while already married with two children.
  • Boney discussed the growth and understanding in their relationship over the years.
  • Despite attractions, he vows that his love for Sridevi will never fade.
  • The couple shares two daughters, Janhvi and Khushi Kapoor, and he has two children from his first marriage.
“I was in love with her, I am in love with her, and I will be in love with her till my dying day…”

This reflection showcases the enduring nature of love and the complexities of relationships over time.

item.title: Legendary writer MT Vasudevan Nair cremated with state honours - Onmanorama
item.description:
Legendary Writer MT Vasudevan Nair Cremated with State Honours

Published: December 26, 2024 07:11 AM IST | Source: Manorama News

Kerala mourns the loss of the legendary Malayalam writer, MT Vasudevan Nair, who was cremated with full state honours. His body was wrapped in red silk and taken to the crematorium, where a gun salute was given. Family members performed the last rites following the ceremony.

  • MT Vasudevan Nair passed away at the age of 91 at Kozhikode Baby Memorial Hospital.
  • He was hospitalized on December 15 due to severe breathing difficulties.
  • A large crowd gathered to pay their respects at the crematorium and his residence.
  • Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan and several celebrities attended the cremation.
  • Ministers and public figures spoke at a condolence meeting following the cremation.
“MT gave me some of the most memorable characters in my film career,” said actor Mohanlal.

The Kerala government declared Thursday and Friday as official days of mourning in honour of the writer, highlighting the profound impact of his contributions to literature.

item.title: Superhit horror comedy film Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3 locks its OTT release date - 123telugu
item.description:
Superhit horror comedy film Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3 locks its OTT release date

Published on: Dec 26, 2024 | Source: 123telugu

Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3, headlined by Kartik Aaryan and Vidya Balan, has emerged as a surprising winner at the box office, clashing with Singham Again during Diwali and grossing around Rs. 280 crores nett in India. The film will be available for streaming on Netflix starting December 27, 2024.

  • The film features a star-studded cast including Kartik Aaryan, Vidya Balan, Triptii Dimri, and Madhuri Dixit.
  • Directed by Anees Bazmee and produced by T-Series.
  • It will have a theatrical window of eight weeks before its OTT release.
“@TheAaryanKartik is here with his seance of humour 😉 Watch the ultimate face-off between Rooh Baba and Manjulika – Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3, out 27 December on Netflix!” — Netflix India

This film is part of a popular franchise and marks the successful continuation of Bollywood horror comedies.

item.title: Was Offered CM Post, They Came Back With Deputy CM Post When I Said No: Sonu Sood - News18
item.description:
Sonu Sood Rejects Political Offers, Remains Committed to Acting

Date: December 26, 2024 Source: News18

Bollywood star Sonu Sood, renowned for his humanitarian efforts during the 2020 COVID-19 lockdown, has declined several political offers including significant roles like Chief Minister and Deputy Chief Minister, reaffirming his commitment to acting.

  • Sood received multiple offers to enter politics, including Chief Minister and Deputy Chief Minister positions.
  • He stated that influential political figures approached him with these offers, emphasizing their surprise at his refusal.
  • Sood values his freedom to help people without political constraints and fears being accountable in a political role.
  • While acknowledging the benefits of political positions, Sood expressed he is not ready for that lifestyle.
  • Finally, he remains focused on his career in cinema, particularly with the upcoming release of his film Fateh.
“I was even offered the position of Chief Minister. When I turned it down, they suggested, ‘Why not Deputy Chief Minister?’”

Sood's steadfast decision highlights his dedication to personal values over political ambition.

item.description:
Salman Khan’s Regal Look in Sikandar Poster Sparks Excitement Ahead of Teaser Release

The first look of Sikandar starring Salman Khan is out! Known for his cinematic expertise, A.R. Murugadoss showcases Salman in an unprecedented avatar, stirring excitement among fans.

item.title: Pushpa 2 UK Box Office: Breaks 7-Year-Old Record Of Baahubali 2 To Become No.1 Tollywood Grosser! - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 UK Box Office: Breaks 7-Year-Old Record Of Baahubali 2 To Become No.1 Tollywood Grosser!

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: Koimoi

Pushpa 2, after almost three weeks in theatres, has surpassed Baahubali 2's lifetime collection, becoming the highest-grossing Tollywood film in the UK.

  • After maintaining strong performance, Pushpa 2 has crossed Baahubali 2's record, a title held since 2017.
  • The film amassed £1.83 million in the UK in 21 days, just edging past Baahubali 2's £1.82 million.
  • The massive buzz around Pushpa 2 contributed to its success not just in India but also internationally.
  • The film's collection in Indian rupees stands at approximately 19.54 crores.
“It unleashed one remarkable feat at the UK box office by surpassing the lifetime collection of Baahubali 2.”

This milestone marks a significant achievement for Indian cinema, showcasing the growing popularity of Tollywood films in international markets.

item.title: Boney Kapoor's doctor reveals Sanjay Kapoor was jealous of him after hair transplant: 'He had it done som - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Sanjay Kapoor's Jealousy Over Hair Transplant Revealed by Doctor

Publication Date: N/A | Source: N/A

In a surprising revelation, Boney Kapoor's doctor shared insights about Sanjay Kapoor's feelings of jealousy following his hair transplant.

  • The doctor noted that Sanjay Kapoor was envious of Boney's hair transplant results.
  • He humorously mentioned that Sanjay had undergone the procedure at a different clinic.
  • The insight adds a light-hearted perspective to celebrity beauty treatments.
“He had it done somewhere else,” the doctor quipped, highlighting the friendly rivalry.

This revelation adds an interesting dynamic to the personal lives of these celebrities and showcases the commonality of such procedures.

item.title: Junaid Khan and Khushi Kapoor's upcoming romantic comedy titled 'Loveyapa' - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Junaid Khan and Khushi Kapoor's Upcoming Romantic Comedy 'Loveyapa'

Publication Date: N/A

Source: Times of India

Junaid Khan and Khushi Kapoor are making their way into the film industry with their upcoming romantic comedy 'Loveyapa'. Directed by Advait Chandan, the film is set to release on February 7, 2025.

  • The film explores the complexities of modern love.
  • It features a delightful mix of humor, romance, and relatable situations.
  • Expect engaging performances, lively music, and stunning visuals.
  • Features a playful tagline: "Situationship? Relationship? Love ka syapa? ya Loveyapa?".
  • Junaid is the son of Aamir Khan, while Khushi is the daughter of Sridevi.
“Situationship? Relationship? Love ka syapa? ya Loveyapa?”

The film aims to resonate with viewers by celebrating love in its various forms, scheduled for a thrilling release in the upcoming year.

item.title: Squid Game season 2 Twitter reviews: Gong Yoo's acting skills are ‘insane’, say fans of the ‘engaging’ series - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Squid Game season 2 Twitter review

Date: Dec 26, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

The latest season of the South Korean dystopian thriller Squid Game dropped on Netflix this Christmas, eliciting enthusiastic responses from fans across social media.

  • Fans flooded X (formerly Twitter) with positive reviews about the series.
  • Many believe season 2 is even better than the first, citing increased tension and thrilling content.
  • Notable performances from Gong Yoo and T.O.P received high praise from viewers.
  • Some fans expressed concerns about the fate of the main character, Seong Gi-hun.
“#GongYoo’s acting skills are insane…”

Overall, while the season has its critics, many fans find it engaging and a worthy continuation of the series.

item.title: Alisha Parveen reveals about Rupali Ganguly's 'strange' reply on her Instagram story: 'I do not know..' - India Forums
item.description:
Alisha Parveen Shares Rupali Ganguly's Unexpected Response to Her Instagram Story

Published: Thursday, December 26, 2024 at 12:39 PM

Alisha Parveen, known for her role as Raahi in Rupali Ganguly's popular show Anupamaa, opened up about the actress' cryptic reply to her Instagram story announcing her exit from the show.

  • Alisha revealed that she received a 'dot dot dot' response from Rupali Ganguly, which left her confused.
  • She expressed her feelings by stating, 'I will miss you mam,' but noted that she has not received a reply back.
  • There is ongoing speculation that Rupali might have been involved in Alisha's replacement, although Alisha herself remains unsure.
  • The character of Raahi is being taken over by Adrija Roy following Alisha's unexpected exit.
“Maine jab ye story post ki toh unhone is story par 'dot dot dot' reply kiya. I don't know why.” - Alisha Parveen

The situation has sparked discussions among fans about the dynamics within the show and the reasons behind Alisha’s departure.

item.title: Squid Game Season 2: Release Date And Time In India, Cast, What To Expect And All About K-drama Before Premiere - News24
item.description:
Squid Game Season 2: Release Date And Time In India

Date Published: December 26, 2024 Source: News24

As the anticipation builds, 'Squid Game Season 2' is set to premiere on Netflix, continuing the thrilling story that captivated audiences worldwide.

Release Date And Time

'Squid Game Season 2' will release on Netflix on December 26 at 1:31 pm in India.

Total Episodes

This season will feature a total of seven episodes.

Cast

  • Lee Jung-jae
  • Lee Byung-hun
  • Wi Ha-jun
  • Gong Yoo
  • Yim Si-wan
  • Kang Ha-neul
  • Park Gyu-young
  • Park Sung-hoon
  • Jo Yu-ri
  • Yang Dong-geun
  • Kang Ae-sim
  • Lee David
  • Lee Jin-uk

The returning cast is joined by several new actors playing characters with their own motives.

About Season 3

Director Hwang Dong-hyuk confirmed that the series will include a third season, emphasizing the immense response from fans and the narrative’s evolution.

“Seong Gi-hun who vowed revenge at the end of Season 1 returns and joins the game again. Will he succeed in getting his revenge?”

Plot Overview

Season 2 picks up from the cliffhanger of Season 1, with Gi-hun set to dive back into the deadly game.

With its gripping narrative and rich character arcs, 'Squid Game Season 2' promises to be another rollercoaster of emotions.

item.title: Varun Dhawan was insecure of Sidharth Malhotra while working on Student of the Year. Here’s why - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Varun Dhawan was insecure of Sidharth Malhotra while working on Student of the Year. Here’s why

Date: Dec 26, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Varun Dhawan shares insights about his insecurities faced during his debut film 'Student of the Year', particularly regarding his co-star Sidharth Malhotra.

  • Varun Dhawan felt insecure while debuting alongside Sidharth Malhotra.
  • His perception of himself shifted as his films began to achieve success.
  • Varun acknowledged the pressures of nepotism in the industry.
  • He had to work hard to prove his talent to the audience.
“Will people even notice me or not? What if my dream only stays a dream?” - Varun Dhawan

Varun’s journey reflects the challenges many actors face in the competitive film industry, especially when dealing with public perception and personal insecurities.
